alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:59AM CDT until July 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR BEAVER COUNTY... At 1258 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Slapout, or 14 miles southeast of Beaver, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment reported 60 mph winds at 12:50 AM in Beaver. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Boyd, Mocane, Slapout and Floris. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
